$WmMPID_ンン,ch04_35_Nn_F_Normal,Face|If I'm not helping, what's the point
of having me around? No one wants
to be friends with someone like me.$k$p$WmMPID_ノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_Normal,Face|But I'M here—and I'm like you! You
don't have to prove anything to me!
We're equal, and we're in it together!$k$p$Sbs1000|
